title.rendered: Christophe Guillarmé. SS23 «Flora Vita» During Paris Fashion Week

content.rendered:
Show Christophe Guillarm. SS23 Flora Vita During Paris Fashion Week


For his Spring-Summer 2023 collection, designer Christophe Guillarm wanted to focus his inspiration on the book Flora by photographer Nick Night revealing a burgeoning and delicate wardrobe out of it. An analogy between Dolce Vita with Fellini exuberant accents but fragile nature. In those transparencies of powder pink tulle with delicate flower embroidery, the collection is a dreamlike cruise in a secret garden. A few silhouettes of carnivorous plants in the Poison Ivy spirit, such as those bustier maxi dresses in red crumpled tulle or volumes in satin , dramatize this revisited nature.

A flowery ode to a nature impacted by the human hand.


https://www.christopheguillarme.fr


By Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad
